document_data.name: ''Borok's Fist''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Borok's Fist''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[warhammer]] that once was wielded by a [[dwarf|dwarven]] hero, [[Borok Thundercracker]], long before the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Borok's Fist'' possessed a ''+2'' [[enchantment]] that guided the wielder's strikes towards their targets and dealt increased damage. Additionally, upon each strike, ''Borok's Fist'' discharged a burst of electricity.
document_data.History: ''Borok's Fist's'' first known owner was Borok Thundercracker, who led his people in battles against [[giant]]s, or "tall vermin", as he called them. It was believed ''Borok's Fist'' was ''[[bless]]ed''. Borok's [[elf|elvish]] allies jokingly called the hammer his "little iron fist." ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, ''Borok's Fist'' was available for purchase from [[Ribald Barterman]]'s [[Adventurer Mart]] in [[Athkatla]], the City of Coin.
